title: Good luck with that: Twitter's new CEO starts in 6 weeks
description: Former NBCUniversal advertising executive Linda Yaccarino is taking over as Twitter CEO, but some wonder if she's being set up to fail.

title: Steam Sports Fest sale features birds, racoons, pro wrestlers, and the lowest price ever on FIFA 23 on PC—but sorry, no race cars
description: The latest big Steam sale is live now and runs all week.

title: This ridiculous deep cut mod adds guns from Bethesda's forgotten Terminator FPS to the biggest (and most frustrating) Elder Scrolls game
description: The hottest guns of 1995 in an absolutely impenetrable RPG from '96.

title: The latest NBA 2K game always gets a huge Steam discount in May, and this year is no exception
description: NBA 2K23 is as cheap as it'll ever be during Steam's Sports Fest.

title: CD Projekt confirms layoffs at the Witcher spinoff studio it acquired just a year ago
description: 29 employees have been let go, most of them from The Molasses Flood.

title: This Stardew and Sailor Moon-inspired farm sim is totally calling to me
description: Fields of Mistria looks like it climbed right out of the '90s in the best way.

title: After a week-long race, Team Liquid secures world's first completion of WoW's Aberrus, the Shadowed Crucible raid
description: Liquid ended a three-year drought since its last world's first in 2020.

title: One of the coolest upcoming city builders now has a free demo on Steam, and you should try it
description: In Laysara: Summit Kingdom, you build a city on the steep slopes of a mountainside. And to do it, you'll need lots of yaks.

title: You're telling me Fortnite is just now getting a ranked mode?
description: Ranked arrives in Fortnite's next season.

title: Blizzard congratulates Diablo 4 player who finally soloed world boss Ashava after two heartbreaking kill steals
description: Despite being at a lower level, Wudijo got the job done with plenty of time to spare.

title: Google won't tell anyone why its withholding Bard AI from the EU
description: Wired jokes that Google's so far given more penguins Bard access than it has Europeans.

title: This sucks: A month after I discover Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodhunt, they're killing it
description: The Vampire battle royale is ending development, but the servers will remain online.

description: You've got some skin in this game.

title: Amazon is making another Lord of the Rings MMO, despite cancelling the last one
description: It's in the early stages of production with the New World team at Amazon Games Orange County.

title: Class balance is still an absolute joke in Diablo 4—but the game has far bigger problems
description: I no longer care who needs buffs and nerfs—none of these classes are any fun to play.

title: EU approves Microsoft's $68.7 billion acquisition of Activision Blizzard
description: The deal still faces hurdles in the UK and US, but this is a big boost for Microsoft.

title: Five years later, a new Hawken is coming to PC
description: Hawken Reborn is a "revitalization" of the fast-paced mech shooter, and it hits early access in a couple of days.

title: G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB DDR5-7200 48GB
description: For when 32GB isn't enough and 64GB is too much.

description: This is art.

title: I have serious regrets about wasting my weekend fighting the Diablo 4 beta's awful world boss
description: A couple of days with Blizzard's latest has tempered my enthusiasm significantly.

title: 'Britain's Bill Gates' finally extradited to California to face charges in 'one of the largest frauds ever prosecuted by the United States Department of Justice'
description: Autonomy founder Mike Lynch sold the company to HP for $11bn in 2011, then everything went pear-shaped.

title: Fablecraft's virtual tabletop combines the best parts of D&D and videogames—this is the future of TTRPGs
description: A simple, accessible way to go on grand adventures with your friends online.

title: Dark web crypto-drug traffickers 'can try to hide in the furthest reaches of the internet, but the Justice Department will find you'
description: With a fentanyl epidemic on its hands, the US Department of Justice has just made its biggest bust yet targeting the dark web.

title: Handhelds like ROG Ally have inspired Microsoft to bring Xbox features to PC
description: Features like Quick Resume could see their way to Windows.

title: Cut content mod restores Skyrim's vampires to their former glory
description: "And so you learn the power of the night."

title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang takes a $2.5 million pay cut after disappointing sales
description: I'd be still be happy with $21 million though.

description: Just a little soldering required.

title: Fortnite is adding ranked play in case you need another way to find out you're not good enough
description: Say goodbye to Arena and hello to ranked.
